results.content: I am very new to managing a VPS. I kept on struggling to install and manage modules after installing the LAMP stack. I really had a tough time trying to shift my websites to my new VPS through he terminal. I took this course and it recommended that I use vestaCP (as cPanel was too expensive for me). I must say that everything I needed to learn was clearly and simply demonstrated and taught in this course! After completing the course, I ran into a problem with FTP. I went online and all the usual places like forums, even the vestaCP forum, but got no help or answer. So I approached the author Riyad Arefin with my problem. He was swift to respond with my solution and help me solve my problem. So I have to recommend this course for anyone who wants to manage a VPS server. This course was truly helpful. Thank you Riyad Arefin!
